Me API thawa idiriyatath me vidiya deval noventa vaga balagatha yuthui. Me 225denama hera ugath buddimath rattata aagamata garu karana naayakayo thoragenimata api sithata gamu. replies.replyComment: @Jeffrey Javadnaha machan ubalata puluwan unwa nawathwanna..un karanne ubalage islam agama issarahata dagena ahinsaka minissu nikan aparade marana eka.ithin ubalata puluwanne bun mubala ge mulu muslim okkoma ekathu wela okunwa gahala  pannana.lankawen ubaka gahauwoth ape sinhala un cristhiyani un okkoma gahanawa machan..aniwaryenma ..api innawaa

Oka nathi kara nam ivarai. Okata mang vagay edineda jeevath venna dangalana evunta ova adalath naha avasyath naha. Ma kalin kiva vagay oba thambi okkoma eka godata danava  ethenai prasne.

@Jeffrey Javad waren baba ubawa nalawanna..varadi karala methana hoda minissu wenna hadanawaa.ubala hodanam lankawata mokada nithi dekak.kathi usawi mokatada?ubalata campus mokatada??ubala ta wenama nithi mokatada lankawe eka niithiyai thiyenne ekata oluwa namapalla.samagiyen idapalla sinhala minisu  ekka nathnam mubalata mude paninna thama wennee
Mama pudgalikava piligannava thambingeth varadi thibenawa. May praharayata sambanda nevay. E sulu dena dan elovata gihin panuwo vela athi.
In passe hitan maithree saha unp anduwath mokada karay. Mung serama keliya kithunuwantai ahinsaka thambintai.

Mata hama thambiyek vama umbala eka godata dana eka varadi kiyalai kiyanne kochcharath.

@Lanka Shama anay pako thota kee vathawak kiyannada mun ekka kisima sambandayak thiya muge nama danagaththeth praharayata passe bava. Mang vagay eheme magay yaluwoma keeyak innawada. Anika zahrantai uge anik evuntai mama sapa karannathi dawasak naha.
Mang vagay unta mang kivve
Mattayanta math baninawA. Nikang may kala bella inna mang vahay unta baninna epa please
Thopita ammata hukonawa kivve katada kiyanna karunakara . Magen pudgalikava kata hari varadak vela naha.

Lanka Shama 2600 AMMAGE REDDA ITIHASAYAK . YAKO , WIJAYA KUMARAYA INDIYAWE HORAKAM KARAMA TATHTA RATEN PITUWAL KARA , WIJAYA KUMARAYA GOLAYO EKKA AWE LANKAWATA . EWITH KUWENIWA KASADA BEDALA , ITA PASSE KUWENIWA DIKKASADA KALA . KUWENI MERENAKOTA LANKATA SAPA KARA . UBATA ITIHASAYA DANNE NETHNAM IGENA GANIN . GON BURUWA .

Lanka Shama KERI PONNAYA , UBATATA MATAKADA 1983 KALU JULIYA , EDA EKA DAWASEN AHINSAKA DEMALA MINISSU 3500 K MERUWA .E HEMA SINHALA MINIHEKMA NEMEI NE . E WAGE TAMAI MEKAT . KAWRU WEREDI KARATH WERADDA EKAMAI , THO NIKAN ISSA WAGE OLUWE GU TIYAGENA KATA KARANNE , MODA HARAKA .

@Yusuf Ahamed yako sinhala minissu nathnam thopita galf wala ottuwange guu thama kanna wennee ponnyoo..tho maha loku werayanam eliyata wara ponnyaa.awith sadde dapan thota wena de balanna ..wal balla.yako api mankolla kawath thopi wagee ahinsaka minissu maranne naha wal balloo...2600 apita hoda ithihasayak thiyenawa..balapan lankawe kohe polawa haruwath thope muslim palli ..mathuwenne naha okkoma wehera vihara wala natabun mathu wenne..tho danne nadda wal balloo..

@Yusuf Ahamed ada 21 mathakada ubata lolla thopi ada thama ahinsaka minissu 250 marapu dawasa ..thopita sapa wenawa ammata hukanna thawa kiyawanna enawa.mokada huththoo bottuwe awee thopi thama bottuwe awee ammata hukana katha nokiya thope waradda piligan ponnaya ..wal uraa .waradi karal enawa methan kiyawanna ..kari wal uuraa

Lanka Shama UBA HITUWADA API UDIN PAHAT UNA KIYALA . UBALA WAGE TAMAI APITH AWE BOTTUWE . UBALATH AWE INDIYAWE IDALA BOTTUWE . UBA MONAWADA APITA KANNA DILA TIYENNE . UBA HITUWADA API UBALA WAGE MANKOLLA KARAYO KIYALA
@Yusuf Ahamed kanna deepu atha hapanne ubala bun api nemei.api unbalata lankawe inna deepu eka thama varadda..harida ubala kapu thana rena jathiyak.ekanee mulu lokayatama  ubalawa arahan..lol

@Yusuf Ahamed ubala thama ekata idala apita ariyee..loke inna epama karapu huththige puthalaa thama ubala.ekata idala hoda muna pennala pukata pihiyen ainawaa.ane pala palko yanna.puk karayoo thopi thama..api nemei anthnam sinhalayata kelenna eida .thopita inna thana dunne sinhala miniha.hukna katha kiyanna epa ..harida
Lanka Shama PUKE ARINA EKA UBALAGE PURUDDA NE BAN . RANJAN KIYAPU EKA HARI WAGE . RASTIYADU KARA KUDDA .

@Yusuf Ahamed ai mage paiya katata gannada ponnayaa.issara wela profile picture ekak dapan lollaa..hangi hagi pada tock danne nathuwa ..poddak hitapan ladeema enawaa.balagena hitapan puka ehema hodagena idapa..ponna mattayaa.üê∑üê∑üê∑üêñüêñüêñüêñ
